detectors.description:
Contract locking ether found in :
	Contract VampTokenSale (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/VampTokenSale__1.sol#534-767) has payable functions:
	 - VampTokenSale.fallback() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/VampTokenSale__1.sol#606-609)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
detectors.markdown:
Contract locking ether found in :
	Contract [VampTokenSale](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/VampTokenSale__1.sol#L534-L767) has payable functions:
	 - [VampTokenSale.fallback()](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/VampTokenSale__1.sol#L606-L609)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
